channel.title: Npc talking
channel.description: can someone give a short tut on how to make word above an npcs head

item.title: Npc talking
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

accually i find delta very nice and its personal opinion and fyi no npcs talk with letter above their head[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2009, 11:24:17 pm[/size][hr]also i did search and found something so i added it under that here is my code.

[code]

                if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2698) {
                    if (misc.random2(1) <= 2) {
                        npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[NPCID].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[NPCID].textUpdate = "Beginner Training Teleport!";
                    }
                }[/code]

item.title: Npc talking
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

okay, go to npchandler.java

search for

if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true) {

then under the last

}

add

                if (npcs[i].npcType == 4555) {
                    if (misc.random2(1) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to Remember The Name Scape!";
                    }
                }

the 4555 is the id of the person and where it says welcome to remember the name scape… is where u put wat u want it to say
